duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct external investigations to prevent and improve shrink in single or multiple stores.
Identify and apprehend shoplifters in compliance with shoplifting apprehension policies.
Prepare, maintain, and retain reports, evidence, and records in accordance with company guidelines and local laws.
Review data reporting to identify external patterns and testify in criminal proceedings when required.
Support internal investigations and collaborate with store management to address asset protection issues.
Work a flexible schedule, including days, evenings, weekends, and holidays.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent. Bachelor’s degree preferred.
